snippet: Jo Nesbo, the crime writer being compared in the United States to Stieg Larsson, had his hair cut, put on a suit and met with booksellers and journalists at Book Expo America last week.
abstract: Jo Nesbo, the Norwegian crime writer often compared to Stieg Larsson, visits the BookExpo America conference in New York to promote his latest novel Phantom.
lead_paragraph: Jo Nesbo, the crime writer being compared in the United States to Stieg Larsson, had his hair cut, put on a suit and met with booksellers and journalists at Book Expo America last week.

headline.seo: Jo Nesbo, Crime Writer From Norway, Visits U.S.
headline.main: Norway Has Noir; Just Ask Jo Nesbo
headline.print_headline: Norway Has Noir; Just Ask Jo Nesbo
